text.section:
Sec. 33-281. Lot coverage.
The maximum lot coverage for one-acre lots or larger shall be fifteen (15) percent of the total lot area, and for the smaller lots (excepted under) shall be twenty-five (25) percent of the total lot area. There shall be no minimum or maximum lot coverage requirements on buildings housing poultry; nor on nursery buildings housing plants where the same are of glass, slats, saran, or of a similar type construction.
